tool_description:
Our agreement platform available as an integratable API
allows your company to send signatures and payments
directly through your technology.
name: Sertifi eSignature and ePayment
title: Sertifi eSignature and ePayment

api_list.name: /v1/{folderId}/participants

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve data for.

items.description: Someone who is part of a folder in some way.

enableIdCheck.description: Will the participant need to pass an id check to view or sign documents in the folder.

lastInvitedAt.description: When the participant was last invited to view/sign a document in the folder.

lastVisitedAt.description: The last time the participant visited this folder.

open.description: How many documents the participant has left to sign.

participantType.description: The different options for types of participants in a folder.

signed.description: The number of documents this participant has signed.

totalItems.description: How many elements should be in the list.

api_list.name: GetFolder

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve data for.

api_list.name: /v1/folders/{folderId}/summary/{documentId}

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve data for.

required_parameters.name: documentId
required_parameters.description: The id of the document to retrieve data for.

schema.description: Summary pdf created for a specific document in a folder

pdfSummary.description: The pdf summary as a byte[]

api_list.name: /v1/users/{email}
/v1/{folderId}/payments

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve data for.

items.description: Represents a payment in the Sertifi system.

allowedPayMethods.description: The payment methods Sertifi should accept. (Credit Card, ACH, etc.)

amount.description: The amount the payment will/did charge.

avsStatus.description: The results of the AVS check.

bankAccountType.description: The type of bank account the payment came from.

bankName.description: The name of the bank the payment came from.

billingName.description: The name on the payment method.

billingZip.description: Billing zip code or postal code.

cardLastFour.description: Last four digits of the credit card.

cardType.description: The type of credit card paid with.

currency.description: The currency the payment was made in.

cvvStatus.description: The result of the CVV check.

dateDue.description: The day that the payment is due. (Primarily for reminder purposes)

documentId.description: The id of the document this payment is attached to.

errorMessage.description: A description of what, if anything, went wrong processing the payment.

gatewayName.description: The name of the gateway through which the payment was processed.

gatewayTokenId.description: The credit card token id from the payment gateway.

gatewayTransactionId.description: The transaction id from the payment gateway.

ipAddress.description: IP Address that the payment was paid from.

operation.description: What was done in this payment (charge a card, authorize a card, refund, etc.)

paymentMethod.description: Method used to pay this payment.

paymentStatus.description: The status of the payment (pending, payed, error, etc.)

routingNumber.description: The ACH routing number for the payment.

title.description: The name the payer sees for this payment.

usePaymentRules.description: Whether or not to apply the general rules defined for payments to this payment.

totalItems.description: How many elements should be in the list.

api_list.name: /v1/{folderId}/invites

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to send invites for.

api_list.name: /v1/{folderId}/payments/{paymentId}

required_parameters.name: paymentId
required_parameters.description: The id of the payment to retrieve data for.

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve data for.

api_list.name: /v1/folders/{folderId}/content

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The folder id of the folder to download
